Description: Redware pottery jar with a shallow pointed base, convex sides, a short neck and an everted rim(chipped), the exterior is marked with a white deposit.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 220)
Rzeuska 2017 / Chronological Overview of Pottery from Asyut (216-217) (Catalogue number 114)
